author: wn.com
title: Compulsive Texting Associated With Poorer School Performance Among Adolescent Girls, Study Finds (American Psychological Association) ...
text: ( Source : American Psychological Association ) WASHINGTON - Teenage girls who compulsively text are more likely than their male counterparts to do worse academically, according to research published by the American Psychological Association.
